content:
Hehe, I wonder if I bug Glenn enough,
maybe I can get him to speed up the shipping...

Things related to our daily lives
are gradually being introduced.
For example, have you seen the Loomi TV in the Camp?

Log in once a day to earn Loomi.
If you log in every single day,
you'll earn even more Loomi! Hmm~! What a great deal!

Ugh, I can't wait! This is taking forever!
You know, the stuff you can exchange with Loomi TV!

Can't get it today,
I'll have to wait for the item to arrive via Astralink delivery tomorrow.
